name: MineJumper
description:
This tiny app is created to make fun and occupy you brains for several minutes or maybe for years =) However, it just another Wayward son =) Wikipedia claims,  that Its grandfather appeared first in OS/2 (Hail Robert Donner!) and then moved to Microsoft Entertainment Pack 1 in 1990.

I will be happy if you can play it and have fun for some time =)
